translated: Secretariat (1970-1989) was a pure racehorse English blood born Bold Ruler and Somethingroyal to stud "The Meadow" This horse is considered one of the greatest champions in the history of horse racing.
original: Secretariat (1970-1989) fut un cheval de course pur sang anglais né de Bold Ruler et Somethingroyal au haras "The Meadow", ce cheval est considéré comme l'un des plus grands champions de l'histoire des courses de chevaux.
